summary: This is a Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York Daily Activity Report for July 8, 2019. It details routine operations, staff leave, inmate counts, and notably records the placement of inmate Jeffrey Epstein on Psychological Observation (Psych Obs) during the evening watch shift.

events.title: Epstein Placed on Psychological Observation
events.description: During the evening watch shift, inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) was placed on Psychological Observation (Psych Obs).

events.title: Fire Suppression System Inoperative
events.description: During the day watch shift, the fire suppression system was reported inoperative, requiring a fire watch to be initiated.

events.title: Staff Shortage Impacts Posts
events.description: Correctional assignments for Phone Monitor, Sally Officer #3, and 10-South #2 were vacated due to a shortage of staff.

events.title: Inmate Admissions and Releases
events.description: Multiple inmates were admitted to and released from MCC New York. Inmate Quiroga was admitted to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) pending an SIS investigation.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein (Inmate #76318-054) was placed on Psychological Observation (Psych Obs) during the evening watch shift on July 8, 2019.

The report indicates a staff shortage that led to the vacating of several correctional officer posts, including the 10-South #2 post which was also vacated on the shift when Epstein was placed on Psych Obs.
The fire suppression system at the MCC was inoperative on July 8, 2019, requiring a fire watch.
The document is a routine daily administrative log from the MCC, dated July 9, 2019, reporting on activities from the previous day.
One inmate (Quiroga #86210-054) was admitted to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) pending a Special Investigative Service (SIS) investigation.
